name: jq-tag-input
description: A JQuery plugin for creating tag input fields.

scripts.build: mkdirp dist && sass jq-tag-input.scss jq-tag-input.css && minify jq-tag-input.js > dist/jq-tag-input.min.js && minify jq-tag-input.css > dist/jq-tag-input.min.css && cpx {package.json,readme.md} dist

author: Tom Machado
